d coach Ancelotti participating ho to take 45 wins 56 games 6 draws and 5 losses, scoring 151 goals, lost only 42 balls, winning up to 80.36%. In the history of Real Madrid, Ancelotti was the highest winning coach, are higher than Jose Mourinho, nike free 4.0 v3 hombre Fabio Capello, Bosque, Guus Hiddink, Di Stefano, who Valdano.Whether it is the big winner as a player or coach, Carlo Ancelotti is the Champions League. Age of the players, Ancelotti at AC Milan validity period, two in 1989 and 1990 to win the military Cup. As a coach, Carlo Ancelotti had three degrees (2003, 2005 and 2007) led Milan reached the Champions League final, and has twice defeated Juventus and Liverpool Champions League aspirations. Milan Champions League once had said DNA, Ancelotti is also true, as a player and coach him four degrees aspirations Champions (Champions League) champion, Lisbon May 25, he will impact the individual football career Champions fifth crown, coach Champions League third career crown. David Moyes after class, the Netherlands became a marshal in charge of Manchester United Van Gaal to dump the most popular candidate, sources said, before May 7, Manchester United may enter into a contract with coach Louis van Gaal, although it is a new coach as soon as possible to determine good thing, but the "Daily Mail" revealed Rooney was very worried, fear of losing the status of the Red Devils chubby male lead.In Manchester United coach Sir Alex Ferguson last season, Van Persie became the most relied on Manchester United in the attack line objects, the Dutch scored 26 goals in a single season, fame can be said to replace Rooney ace position in front of the Red Devils. Moyes took over last summer so that a change in the status of the two, because during Everton David Moyes and Wayne Rooney is the mentoring relationship, so chubby in this season to replace Van Persie once again become the male lead, with a dramatic , due to the upcom

ing White Van Gaal, Van Persie is likely to achieve the "restoration", "Daily Mail" that it makes Rooney felt worried, downtown transfer last summer scene may be repeated.Last summer, Ferguson officially retired before Ferguson retired, zapatillas nike free 4.0 v2 the old man suddenly Scottish Rooney "stabbed," Ferguson told the media that Rooney submitted a transfer request to Manchester United top breaking news, but for the news Rooney has been denied, and afterwards, from the analysis of the British media's point of view, this is entirely a conspiracy concocted by Ferguson, which makes Rooney very angry, this has been the scene of downtown transfer last summer, Paris, Barcelona, Bayern , Chelsea, Arsenal have contact with chubby together, eventually leaving Rooney Moyes was against all the odds, and chubby with a single season, "two pairs" data Moyes return the trust is more important yes, he was replaced by Robin van Persie again became Manchester United's top players."Own courtiers", as David Moyes's class, Van Gaal took over the upcoming Dream Theater, which allows him to Robin van Persie and the team disciples reunion. It is worth mentioning that Van Gaal took over the Dutch team in the beginning of his relationship with Robin van Persie is very discord, but Robin Man With hard training and professionalism Van Gaal moved, then Van Persie has become the Oranje captain, he and Van Gaal also staged a "war and peace" scene. Just last week, came after Manchester United news intentionally Van Gaal, the Dutch media have seen Van Gaal and Van Persie shot while sitting side by side on a Eredivisie league. "Daily Mail" that if Manchester United coach Louis van Gaal, then not only will not leave Robin van Persie, Manchester United and he will

again become the number one choice in the center position, while Wayne Rooney will probably be forced to make sacrifices, back position withdrawal is obvious, which is obviously unacceptable chubby. This summer once again staged a farce out of the transfer This is not alarmist. Beijing tomorrow morning, another Champions League final this season, participating teams will be produced at Stamford Bridge, Mourinho hopes at home to help the team achieve their dreams. Although once were led Porto and Inter Milan had made the Champions League, but Chelsea coach Jose Mourinho period, has never led his unit tried to advance to the finals.Chelsea are in the Champions League final twice medal after Mourinho left the band, zapatillas nike free 3.0 v4 respectively, by Grant and DiMatteo to complete the mission, Mike Mussina naturally want their personal time to complete this journey.Both sides in the first leg of the contest, the Blue Lion on the road and paid the price Cech and John Terry injured, was able to draw with Atletico 0-0. But Terry really worthy Hud, everyone thought he would have been the season, and who knows he should comeback recently trained. British media said: "Terry let everyone surprised, he is a tough guy, you want to play on Wednesday (with Atletico) game." Starter if he can, it will greatly help the team.From the historical record, the Blue Lion seven times in the first leg of the Champions League knockout stage draw away and eventually lost the second leg only 2 times. But there are also disadvantages, Chelsea have reached the Champions League semi-finals six times, only two successful finals, and four times out among 2 times is made under the first leg 0-0 at the situation encountered.The game, Chelsea lineup severely crippled,
